trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Fairfield
There were 2 other sightings in Fairfield on or around April 30th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI'm submitting this for an uneasy friend who wants to know what's going on. His son said he saw "a rocket" at about 6:30 pm. He was driving and unable to look, though. About 15 minutes ago now, my friend was sitting in his hot tub outside and here is his description word for word: "OK. There is very strange aerial activity over Fairfield, CT right now. Tons of Quiet objects in the air. I am actually a little freaked out. I was outside in the hot tub and feeling very paranoid. I was seeing several lights across the sky, almost like airplane lights or shooting stars, but it wasn't either of those." He is sending me a video as we speak, I'll pass it along as soon as I can get it uploaded.
Summary: Several silent arial objects in air right now
